events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on highway I-95, requesting claim initiation.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of initial collision details and vehicle type.
Assigned claim handler Agent Lewis to manage all communications and follow-ups regarding the car accident claim.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the vehicle accident claim and next steps.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and insurance documents for proper claim evaluation.
Customer uploaded all required documents including accident photos, police report, and personal ID proofs.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted materials and started contacting involved parties for clarifications.
Completed thorough examination of accident circumstances and verified all claim-related facts with third parties.
A settlement amount was calculated and proposed to the claimant based on repair estimates and coverage terms.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling process.
Management approved the claim settlement, allowing the process to move forward to payment issuance.
Settlement payment was issued to the claimantâ€™s bank account for vehicle repair expenses as agreed.
Closed the claim after confirmation that the payment was received and repairs were completed satisfactorily.
